item.title: 미추홀구 아파트 전월세
item.description: 미추홀구 월별 전월세 거래량 rent_data %>% group_by(month = floor_date(계약날짜, "month"), 임대형태) %>% summarise(count=n(), .groups='drop') %>% spread(key='임대형태',value='count') %>% replace(is.na(.), 0) %>% mutate(합계 = 전세 + 월세, 증감률 = (합계 / lag(합계,24) -1 )* 100) %>% # View plot_ly(x=~month, type="bar", y=~월세, name="월세") %>% add_trace(y=~전세, name="전세") %>% layout(yaxis = list(title="거래량"), barmode = 'stack') %>% layout(title = '미추홀구 월별 전월세 거래량') {"x":{"visdat":{"5cf181db375b9":["function () "

item.title: 2020-11-17 미추홀구 아파트 매매
item.description:
미추홀구 전년도 비교 미추홀구 아파트 2019년 vs 2020년 data %>% group_by(year = floor_date(계약날짜, "year")) %>% summarise(거래금액평균 = round(mean(거래금액)),거래량 = n(), .groups="drop") %>% mutate(year = paste0(str_sub(year,1,4),"년")) %>% datatable(options = list(pageLength = 20)) {"x":{"filter":"none","data":[["1","2"],["2019년","2020년"],[22646,23275],[3278,4654]],"container":"
 
 
 
 year
 거래금액평균
 거래량
 
 
","options":{"pageLength":20,"columnDefs":[{"className":"dt-right","targets":[2,3]},{"orderable":false,"targets":0}],"order":[],"autoWidth":false,"orderClasses":false,"lengthMenu":[10,20,25,50,100]}},"evals":[],"jsHooks":[]} 미추홀구 아파트별 평균 거래 금액 2019년 vs 2020년 data %>% group_by(year = floor_date(계약날짜, "year"), 아파트, 전용면적) %>% summarise(거래금액평균 = round(mean(거래금액)), .

item.title: 집계할 때 plotly 그래프가 표시되지 않는 오류 수정
item.description: 해결 방법 .group="drop"를 추가한다. library(tidyverse) ## -- Attaching packages ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------- tidyverse 1.3.0 -- ## √ ggplot2 3.3.2 √ purrr 0.3.4 ## √ tibble 3.0.1 √ dplyr 1.0.0 ## √ tidyr 1.1.0 √ stringr 1.4.0 ## √ readr 1.3.1 √ forcats 0.5.0 ## -- Conflicts -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- tidyverse_conflicts() -- ## x dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() ## x dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() library(plotly) ## ## 다음의 패키지를 부착합니다: 'plotly' ## The following object is masked from 'package:ggplot2': ## ## last_plot ## The following object is masked from 'package:stats': ## ## filter ## The following object is masked from 'package:graphics': ## ## layout iris %>% group_by(Species) %>% summarize(count = n(), Sepal.

item.title: github page 만들기(feat. blogdown)
item.description: 블로깅을 꾸준히 할지 모르겠지만.. 한번 만들어봤음ㅎㅎ blogdown으로 블로그를 만들고 github page로 배포하는 방법을 까먹기 전에 정리함~ blogdown r에서 블로그를 만들어주는 패키지 blogdown 설치 install.packages('blogdown') blogdown project 만들기 File -> New Project -> New Directory -> Website using blogdown theme 추가하기 $ git submodule add https://github.com/LukasJoswiak/etch.git themes/etch theme 설정하기 config.toml 파일에서 theme = "etch" 설정을 수정 github page github repo 만들기 github에서 username.github.io 이름으로 신규 저장소를 만든다. github repo clone blogdown propect와 동일한 위치에서 page를 clone를 한다.

item.title: 부평구 재개발 내 다세대연립 매매
item.description: ## 필요한 패키지를 로딩중입니다: xml2 ## -- Attaching packages ------------------------------------------------- tidyverse 1.3.0 -- ## √ ggplot2 3.3.2 √ purrr 0.3.4 ## √ tibble 3.0.1 √ dplyr 1.0.0 ## √ tidyr 1.1.0 √ stringr 1.4.0 ## √ readr 1.3.1 √ forcats 0.5.0 ## -- Conflicts ---------------------------------------------------- tidyverse_conflicts() -- ## x dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() ## x readr::guess_encoding() masks rvest::guess_encoding() ## x dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() ## x purrr::pluck() masks rvest::pluck() ## ## 다음의 패키지를 부착합니다: 'lubridate' ## The following objects are masked from 'package:base': ## ## date, intersect, setdiff, union ## ## 다음의 패키지를 부착합니다: 'plotly' ## The following object is masked from 'package:ggplot2': ## ## last_plot ## The following object is masked from 'package:httr': ## ## config ## The following object is masked from 'package:stats': ## ## filter ## The following object is masked from 'package:graphics': ## ## layout ddd ddffd

item.title: A Plain Markdown Post
item.description: This is a post written in plain Markdown (*.md) instead of R Markdown (*.Rmd). The major differences are: You cannot run any R code in a plain Markdown document, whereas in an R Markdown document, you can embed R code chunks (```{r}); A plain Markdown post is rendered through Blackfriday, and an R Markdown document is compiled by rmarkdown and Pandoc. There are many differences in syntax between Blackfriday’s Markdown and Pandoc’s Markdown.

item.title: About
item.description: This is a “hello world” example website for the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.
